response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. Should you choose to accept, you'll be unlocking a wealth of benefits and possibilities that come with owning this remarkable asset. I look forward to discussing how we can make this a mutually beneficial arrangement.", "product_price": 1200000}
